definition: small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
lit. clear window and clean table (idiom)/fig. bright and clean
a small table to accommodate an incense burner
lit. clear window and clean table (idiom); fig. bright and clean (room)
lit. piles of work and papers (idiom); fig. accumulated backlog of work

sentences.english: She was several inches taller than I was, and unnaturally blond.
sentences.chinese: 她比我高几英寸，漂亮得簡直違背了自然規律。

sentences.english: She wanted to have her skirt let down several centimetres.
sentences.chinese: 她想把裙子放長几釐米。

sentences.english: Kenya's second-largest city, however, is hardly a ghost town.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亞第二大城市几几乎成爲了幽靈之城。

sentences.english: It was framed by a small circle of blood a few inches below his breastbone.
sentences.chinese: 槍眼在胸骨下方几英寸的地方，四周都是血。

sentences.english: The latter measure a few dozen micrometres across; hundreds could crowd on to a pinhead.
sentences.chinese: 後者長几十個微米，一個針尖上可以放下幾百條。

sentences.english: Of course, after a few minutes, the branch fell and Nasreddin fell with it.
sentences.chinese: 當然，在短短几分鐘，樹枝落和納斯雷金掉。

sentences.english: Harbin talent market first several go to work?
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱人才市場初几上班？

sentences.english: In a matter of minutes you can completely exfoliate your skin.
sentences.chinese: 短短几分鐘就可以使你的肌膚煥然一新。

definition: more than ten/a dozen or more
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
